Public NotInheritable Class DescriptionAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class DescriptionAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Sets the description on an assembly (application), component, method, or interface. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](/dotnet/standard/attributes/).
